Package task5

package task5
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    task5.impl
     
  • Class
    Description
    Message
    A message is a byte array that can be sent through a MessageQueue.
    MessageQueue
    A MessagesQueue represents a channel for sending and receiving Message objects.
    MessageQueue.ReadListener
    Listener interface to handle incoming messages and connection lifecycle events.
    MessageQueue.WriteListener
    Listener interface to handle the completion of message sending operations.
    QueueBroker
    A QueueBroker is a high-level abstraction that manages message-based communication by accepting connections and routing Message objects between hosts.
    QueueBroker.AcceptListener
    Listener interface to handle incoming accepted connections.
    QueueBroker.ConnectListener
    Listener interface to handle connection results.
